facts: The scene takes place in Dean's minivan, with Dean driving.
It is night, moments later after the madness in the farmhouse
The group were just fighting for their lives in the farmhouse
Tim was being beaten up until Ronald saved him when he talked like a badass
Dean looks nervously in the rearview mirror-- all clear.
Ronald tries to calm Tim down in the backseat.
Dean, Joan, Tim and Ronald are friends.
comm_style: Tim is wholesome and positive, though undercurrents of desperation lurk just behind his kind eyes.
Dean's massive personality just barely hides an undercurrent of sadness and insecurity
Joan Ostrowski-Fox. Is middle-management sexy, if slightly too tan
Ronald Wilkes is 45, is conservative in dress and demeanor
Ronald has undoubtedly been called a nerd more than once
Ronald had community theater training, he did a convincing performance Omar from the HBO program, The Wire
To Tim, Ronald is the embodiment of cool and hilarity
goals: The group tries to understand what just happened at the farmhouse
Ronald explains how he managed to look like a badass
